sentences.en: An early 1930s Ford on the cobblestone streets of Trinidad, Cuba, in February 2006.
sentences.cn: 2006年2月，一辆30年代的福特公司的汽车，停在古巴特立尼达区的鹅卵石街道上。

sentences.en: With its older cities, Europe is more amenable to meandering.Think cobblestone streets and hidden gardens.
sentences.cn: 欧洲，由于它的古老，有鹅卵石的街道和隐秘花园，便于人们漫步于其中。

sentences.en: With its older cities, Europe is more amenable to meandering. Think cobblestone streets and hidden gardens.
sentences.cn: 欧洲，由于它的古老，有鹅卵石的街道和隐秘花园，便于人们漫步于其中。
